alignments.name: Autodesk Certified Instructor Program
alignments.description: Autodesk helps their Learning Partner Instructors and instructional employees develop instructional skills to advance their careers by earning Autodesk Certified Instructor (ACI) Certification online. ACI instructors are recognized experts at providing training in Autodesk software.

badge_template_activities.title: Pre-requisite: Autodesk Certified Instructor - Silver. Annual requirements: Attend a minimum of product/workflow training hours. Teach Product training annual minimums with courses registered in Autodesk Training Evaluation System. Submit an article or featured contribution to a published journal, the Autodesk Knowledge Network (AKN), or deliver or publish a presentation at a professional/education conference or AU. Attend minimum hours of professional instructional development.
Maintenance is for a six year period, and requires the following annually:
Attend a minimum hours of product/workflow training
Teach Product training annual minimums with courses registered in Autodesk Training and Evaluation System
Submit an article or featured contribution to a published journal, the Autodesk Knowledge Network (AKN) and/or deliver and/or publish a presentation at a professional/education conference
Attend minimum hours of professional development (instructional delivery, instructional design, curriculum development, project management, etc.) related to the core area of expertise

d1ecdef2-ae89-43f5-a5e3-2d29117041c7.description: This Autodesk Certified Credential validates the skills and accomplishments earned throughout the "Autodesk CAD/CAM for Manufacturing Specialization" found on Coursera. These courses focused on the foundations of CAD and CAM, while developing technical skills in Autodesk® Fusion 360™.

ea69be94-bcf6-4687-95bd-e766079ab116.description: Autodesk created an internal program (Sustainability G.O.A.L Program) to equip employees with tools and strategies to partner with customers in achieving their sustainability goals. There are 4 levels: Guest / Official / Ambassador / Leader. After earning the Ambassador status, the employee will be able to demonstrate an advanced understanding of Autodesk Impact Strategy, Sustainability Solutions/workflows and to have impactful conversations with customers.
ea69be94-bcf6-4687-95bd-e766079ab116.name: Autodesk Sustainability Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a sustainability online course and/or read the latest Autodesk Impact Report
Lead a sustainability onboarding session for new hires, or introduce your team to Sustainability at Autodesk.
Pass a win with sustainability exam with a score higher than 84%.
Create a portfolio of six customers and get familiar with their sustainability goals.
Demonstrate familiarity with Autodesk sustainability content ( customer stories, programs, impact report,...)
